revised_title: Strategies for Delaying the Evolution of Insecticide Resistance
tldr: This article explores the effects of applying insecticides sequentially in space and time on the evolution of insecticide resistance. The author discusses various modes of application and their potential to delay the onset of resistance, focusing on the importance of gene flow and the use of biological control methods in combination with insecticide application.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Evolutionary Biology
